text:
@MattHancock 'We'll start rolling out delivery of.... '

'We're planning widespread testing soon....'

'We'll be bringing on-stream thousands more....'

'We're ramping up supply of....'

Every day more awful excuses & 'cheque in the post' language from the Government on coronavirus
